channel.title: Untitled Miniblog
channel.description: Experimental posts, random thoughts, and all manner of shenanigans

item.title: Cold Weather Car Gear
item.description: A listicle style post, derived from notes while I was stuck on the road for a day.

item.title: Creating a Miniblog
item.description: I'm experimenting with creating a different section of my blog for shorter posts that are more off the cuff, posts on external platforms, and different mediums.
